# Dropdown Item

A basic dropdown item.

## Basic

```html
<bal-dropdown-item value="1">Label</bal-dropdown-item>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                       | Type                                    | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | The value of the dropdown item. This value will be returned by the parent <bal-dropdown> element. | `boolean \| number \| object \| string` | `false` |


## Events

| Event        | Description                       | Type               |
| ------------ | --------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `clickEvent` | Click event of the dropdown item. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
